activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: True or False: Players can purchase both Draw and Scratcher games from the Gemini Touch.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: Sorry, the answer is True. Players can purchase both Draw and Scratcher games from the Gemini Touch.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: When players win, they can choose to receive credits for their winnings up to what amount for use to purchase additional tickets from the Gemini Touch?

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: When players win, they can choose to purchase up to $200.00 in tickets using their winnings from the Gemini Touch.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: True or False: The Gemini Touch features a Ticket Scan Plus function that allows players to scan Scratcher and Draw Game ticket barcodes to see if it is a winner.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: The Gemini Touch can carry up to ____ Scratcher games at a time.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: The Gemini Touch can carry up to 28 different Scratcher games at a time.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: True or False: All Reports are available from a single Reports function on the Management Functions menu.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: All Reports are available from one button on the Management Functions menu.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: Which of the following menu options on the Manager Functions screen would you use to confirm Scratcher game deliveries and activating packs of tickets?

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: The correct response is the Instant Functions button.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: To avoid ticket jams, do not load tickets over 10" into Bins 1-4.

invalid.label: Sorry,
invalid.text: The correct answer is: To avoid ticket jams, do not load tickets over 10" long into the lowest ticket trays - Bins 25 through 28.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: What are the correct steps to load a partial pack of scratcher tickets into the Gemini Touch?

options.label: Scan the last ticket in the pack.
Scan the first ticket in the pack.
Scan the first ticket in the pack and the last ticket in the pack.
Scanning the pack is not necessary; the terminal does not keep track of the tickets loaded into bins.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: You should scan the first ticket in the pack and the last ticket in the pack.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: Multiple Choice: You just opened the Gemini Touch door and the alarm is sounding. How do you silence it?

options.label: Sign on using the Touch Screen on the Manager Display.

invalid.label: Incorrect.
invalid.text: The correct answer is: Sign on using the Touch Screen on the Manager Display.

activities.name: Assessment
activities.label: True or False: All Draw Game tickets produced by the Gemini Touch are Quick Pick Only.
